types.html:
ne faire qu'une bouchée

  1. to make short work of; to eat in one go, voraciously [with de ‘food’]
    Synonym: faire un sort à
  2. (figuratively) to make short work of, to make mincemeat out of [with de ‘something’]
trans: to eat in one go, voraciously .mw-parser-output .object-usage-tag{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output .deprecated{color:olivedrab}
to make short work of, to make mincemeat out of
to eat in one go, voraciously .mw-parser-output .object-usage-tag{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output .deprecated{color:olivedrab}

title: ne faire qu'une bouchée
